answers.answer: Hi there!There are no exercises, medications or supplements found to be effective in treatment of avascular necrosis. Lesions involving smaller regions are mostly managed conservatively while most others require surgery. Biphosphonates are a group of medications that are believed to slow the bone breakdown, although the effect is yet to be established substantially. Other than this, other preventive measures that may be helpful are avoiding alcohol, control of diabetes and increased cholesterol (if involved), avoiding radiation and steroids etc. I would suggest discussing the situation in detail with your orthopedician for appropriate management.Hope this helps.Take care!
